entry.title: andyhub1991/chrome_tab_grouper: __Recent Tabs Grouper__ is a Chrome extension that helps power users manager browser clutter by grouping open tabs by domain and displaying the most recently accessed tabs. It features collapsible, tab groups, last activity timestamps, and one-click tab closing - all in a lightweight popup UI.
entry.content: __Recent Tabs Grouper__ is a Chrome extension that helps power users manager browser clutter by grouping open tabs by domain and displaying the most recently accessed tabs. It features collapsible, tab groups, last activity timestamps, and one-click tab closing - all in a lightweight popup UI.

entry.title: saniyafatima07/Moodify: Moodify is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to boost your productivity by offering quick mental refreshment. With a simple click, access jokes, quotes, songs, or riddles to reset your mood and return to work with renewed focus.

entry.title: proteeti89/workout-tracker: Workout Tracker is a lightweight fitness tracking app built with Next.js and ShadCN UI. It allows users to log workouts manually by entering exercises, sets, reps, and weights ‚Äî along with metadata like date, duration, location, and notes. Users can also add custom exercises, and view their full workout history saved locally in the browser.
entry.content: Workout Tracker is a lightweight fitness tracking app built with Next.js and ShadCN UI. It allows users to log workouts manually by entering exercises, sets, reps, and weights ‚Äî along with metadata like date, duration, location, and notes. Users can also add custom exercises, and view their full workout history saved locally in the browser.
